sn54.6:4.5: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn54.6:4.7: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, ariṭṭha, bhāvesi ānāpānassatin”ti?
sn54.6:4.8: “Atītesu me, bhante, kāmesu kāmacchando pahīno, anāgatesu me kāmesu kāmacchando vigato, ajjhattabahiddhā ca me dhammesu paṭighasaññā suppaṭivinītā.
sn54.6:4.9: So satova assasissāmi, satova passasissāmi.
sn54.6:5.2: Api ca, ariṭṭha, yathā ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hoti taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
sn54.6:5.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ariṭṭho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.6:6.2: Idha, ariṭṭha, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn54.6:6.4: Dīghaṃ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṃ assasāmī’ti pajānāti … pe …
sn54.6:6.6: Evaṃ kho, ariṭṭha, ānāpānassati vitthārena paripuṇṇā hotī”ti.
